attributes.action: ban the GB Olympic team from competing at the next Olympics due to the shocking level of animal cruelty which takes place in China.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the recent Sky News report showing dreadful cruelty to animals in China, eg a live cow was thrown into a cage full of lions in a zoo. This was sanctioned by the Zoo managment. In light of this behaviour, the GB Olympic team, should be withdrawn from the next games in protest.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
